channel.title: affect you on Workerpedia
channel.description: Recent content in affect you on Workerpedia

item.title: Does it actually really affect you though? Why care so much if it doesn't affect you?
item.description: Many of our white comrades would say that our struggles do affect them, and that even if they didn’t, they would still care because they have a base level of care for other human beings. Other people matter. But let’s go one step further and say that it doesn’t affect you and other people don’t matter. It may very well affect you in the future, may it not? Why let it get to that point?
